properties.title: Java Pairing and Lattice Based Cryptography Library : Docs - Android
properties.author: Angelo De Caro

section.name: Android
section.p: Arcanum runs out of box on Android (2.1+ version).

subsection.name: A Benchmark App
subsection.p: Download the following APK to benchmark Arcanum on your terminal. Once the benchmark is finished the results can be found on the external memory in a file called "benchmark.out".
If you donâ€™t mind it sending me the results with a description of the characteristics of the terminal used please contact me.
